cyclone.name: BILL
cyclone.current_location: about 55 mi SE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest toward the middle Texas coast, then inland across south-central Texas
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Port O'Connor / Matagorda Island, TX

weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Baffin Bay to High Island, TX
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Upper Texas coast and western Louisiana coast (including Calcasieu/Cameron Parishes)
weather_observation.wind: 30% chance of experiencing sustained tropical-storm-force winds (≥34 kt) with strongest gusts Tuesday afternoon/evening.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–2 ft inundation possible along the immediate western Louisiana coast, including Calcasieu Lake entrance.
weather_observation.rainfall: 2–4 inches of rain possible with locally higher amounts, mainly Tuesday through early Wednesday.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Low risk of isolated tornadoes in western Louisiana.
